Uses of Class
com.jolbox.bonecp.ConnectionHandle

  • Packages that use ConnectionHandle 
    Package Description
    com.jolbox.bonecp
    The core package for the BoneCP connection pool.
    com.jolbox.bonecp.hooks
    Support for event notification on a connection state.
